#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long int

/*int gcd(int a, int b)
    {
        if (a%b == 0)
        return b;
        return gcd(b, a%b);
    } */
int main()
{
    int t;
   
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        ll n,m;
         ll a=1,b=1;
        cin>>n>>m;
        for(ll i=0;i<n-1;i++)
        {

            a=(a+b)%m;
            b=(a+b)%m;
        }
        cout<<(a)%m<<'/'<<(b)%m<<endl;
        }
        return 0;
    }
